title: Hadi in stable condition: Inqilab Moncho
body: Sharif Osman Hadi, aspiring independent MP candidate from Dhaka-8 and spokesperson for Inqilab Moncho, is now in a stable condition. According to a Facebook update from Inqilab Moncho today, Hadi's brother informed from Singapore that his condition had initially worsened following primary tests but has since stabilised. Doctors said another operation is necessary. However, Hadi is not in a physical condition to undergo another surgery at this moment. Hadi was shot on December 12 in Dhaka's Paltan area, and was flown to Singapore on December 15 following a directive from Chief Adviser Prof Muhammad Yunus.
